layman_description: A military cargo truck with an enclosed cargo area containing army supplies.
technical_description: A vehicle loot container with military equipment settings and scaled 3D shape for larger terrain placement.
player_impact: Provides military-grade weapons and gear when players search the truck bed.

layman_description: A damaged military cargo truck with an exposed open cargo area.
technical_description: A damaged vehicle loot container scaled larger than standard blocks with electrical component loot settings.
player_impact: Allows players to access valuable military supplies and electrical parts from an abandoned army truck.

layman_description: A helper block for testing army truck loot distribution in the game world.
technical_description: A developer visualization tool for the military truck loot system in pink color.
player_impact: Used by modders to test and balance military equipment drop rates.

layman_description: A cloth backpack found in the game world that holds supplies and gear.
technical_description: A cloth-material loot container with backpack loot settings and a 3D model for ground placement.
player_impact: Offers a realistic way for players to find extra supplies scattered throughout the world.

layman_description: An alternative cloth backpack variant for world loot.
technical_description: A player-discoverable color variant of the backpack container, copied from the base backpack.
player_impact: Provides visual variety while keeping the same loot rewards as other backpacks.

layman_description: A helper block for testing backpack and bag loot in the game world.
technical_description: A developer tool for visualizing backpack loot randomization using a pink tinted icon.
player_impact: Used by modders to verify and adjust backpack spawn locations and loot tables.

layman_description: A set of four hazardous acid barrels grouped together that explode when hit.
technical_description: A multi-barrel acid container with explosive settings and large loot rewards for destruction.
player_impact: Creates dangerous environmental hazards that damage players but reward them with resources when destroyed.

layman_description: A second variation of four hazardous acid barrels grouped together.
technical_description: A multi-barrel acid container variant with different explosion effects and positioning than QuadA.
player_impact: Provides visual variation for grouped hazardous containers in industrial areas.

layman_description: A single hazardous acid barrel that explodes when damaged.
technical_description: An industrial metal loot container with acid properties and explosive hazard settings.
player_impact: Creates dangerous obstacles in industrial buildings that reward brave or prepared players with supplies.

layman_description: A single hazardous acid barrel rotated 45 degrees for varied placement.
technical_description: A rotated variant of the acid barrel container with different explosion animation from the standard 0-degree version.
player_impact: Allows builders to place acid barrels at different angles for more natural industrial layouts.

layman_description: An older style rusty gas barrel that can explode when damaged.
technical_description: A rust-colored variant of the gas barrel container using an alternative 3D shape model.
player_impact: Provides environmental danger and loot in industrial locations with different visual style.

layman_description: A set of four flammable gas barrels grouped together that explode dangerously.
technical_description: A multi-barrel gas container with large explosion effects and substantial loot rewards for destruction.
player_impact: Creates lethal environmental hazards that can destroy structures and reward well-equipped players.

layman_description: A second variation of four flammable gas barrels grouped together.
technical_description: A multi-barrel gas container variant with different explosion effects and positioning than QuadA.
player_impact: Provides visual variety for grouped fuel containers in industrial or military locations.

layman_description: A single flammable gas barrel that explodes violently when damaged.
technical_description: An industrial metal container with gas fuel properties and powerful explosive hazard settings.
player_impact: Creates dangerous fire hazards in buildings that explode and damage nearby structures when triggered.

layman_description: A single flammable gas barrel rotated 45 degrees for angled placement.
technical_description: A rotated variant of the gas barrel with different explosion animation orientation.
player_impact: Enables builders to position fuel barrels at various angles in industrial scenes.

layman_description: A set of four generic industrial barrels grouped together containing mixed supplies.
technical_description: A multi-barrel industrial container with varied explosion effects and large loot for collection.
player_impact: Provides substantial rewards when players destroy grouped industrial containers.
